sentences.sentence: The transdermal enhancing effect of 3% eucalyptus oil and 3% menthene was superior to that of 10% clove oil.
sentences.translation: 3％桉叶油和薄荷油对奥沙普秦渗透性的促进作用强于10％丁香油。

sentences.sentence: Conclusion: Theophylline transdermal patch has good permeation in vitro.
sentences.translation: 结论：茶碱贴片体外经皮渗透作用较好。

sentences.sentence: OBJECTIVE to investigate the transdermal iontophoresis of piroxicam gel in vitro.
sentences.translation: 目的考察吡罗昔康凝胶的体外经皮离子导入。
